Viren.label: Long hours of studying can result in exhaustion and overwhelm, leading to difficulty in maintaining focus and retaining information for students.
Viren is a note-taking app, helps you summarize and visualize your thought process in the form of a mindmap
At the moment, our MVP works well with teachers, students and student groups, retaining the most vital information
With proper funding from company "A", our app can become a productive collaboration tool for use in professional context
Watch out, Atlassian. We're coming for you (and looking for work).
Go Viren. Think faster, think better.
